s.text: Beatty referred to his critics as "those moneyed, honeyed voices of ridicule."
Sure, he's for campaign-finance reform--but not for full public financing of all federal elections.
He also said he thinks the domestic policies of Lyndon B. Johnson were all good programs that didn't get a fair shake because of the Vietnam War.

Michael Ovitz appeared in a Bulworth outfit of wraparound shades and a black knit cap.
